[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_pause()] [Authorization Escalation] If OwnerCap is compromised, can an attacker set paused=true permanently and then destroy or hide the cap, creating an irreversible DoS where all protocol operations are frozen with no recovery path? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_borrow_cap()] [Missing Pause Check] Can set_borrow_cap() modify borrow_cap_ceiling while paused=true, enabling an attacker with OwnerCap to raise borrow limits during pause and then unpause to allow massive over-borrowing before monitoring systems react? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_treasury_factor()] [Missing Pause Check] Can treasury_factor be modified via set_treasury_factor() during pause state, allowing manipulation of fee collection rates when users cannot withdraw or adjust positions? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_liquidation_ratio()] [Missing Pause Check] Can liquidation_ratio be changed while paused=true, enabling adjustment of liquidation thresholds when price oracles are potentially stale or unreliable during emergency conditions?
